name: Half-Life: Abeyance
storyline: You play as Jane Doe, a HECU grunt, while hunting for the assassin who left you and your buddies for the Grim Reaper. The finale of the trilogy of mods.
summary: Abeyance is the final entry into the trilogy of mods featuring the protagonist Jane Doe, the first two being HTC and Autonomy Lost. You play as Jane Doe, a HECU grunt, while hunting for the assassin who left you and your buddies for the Grim Reaper.
